wounded shape [secondshape]: â‡’ #3085 Oni Spirit

(sacred [holy], heals-afflictions-when-shapechanging [cleanshape], need-not-eat [neednoteat], demon [demon], mountain-survival [mountainsurvival], snow-move [snowmove], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
#nametype [nametype]: 134
Oni of exceptional strength and power sometimes appear at the demon gates. They are called Amanojaku and are considered sacred and are given heavy armor rarely used by their kin. Amanojaku are few and only appear at the demon gates built by human priests and worshippers.
